title: "Illinois judge kicks Clearview AI lawsuit back to state court at plaintiffs' request"
excerpt: "A biometric privacy lawsuit against Clearview AI Inc is headed back to state court, where it was originally filed, after a federal judge rejected the company's argument that the case should stay in federal court where other lawsuits against it are pending."
